channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7c2e40b7-25eb-482a-82cb-78ba06cb46d5
Display name: Chaos Studio Experiment Contributor
Description: Can create, run, and see details for experiments, onboard targets, and manage capabilities.
Link: https://management.azure.com/7c2e40b7-25eb-482a-82cb-78ba06cb46d5?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 29e2da8a-229c-4157-8ae8-cc72fc506b74
Display name: Chaos Studio Reader
Description: Can view targets, capabilities, experiments, and experiment details.
Link: https://management.azure.com/29e2da8a-229c-4157-8ae8-cc72fc506b74?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 1a40e87e-6645-48e0-b27a-0b115d849a20
Display name: Chaos Studio Operator
Description: Can run and see details for experiments but cannot create experiments or manage targets and capabilities.
Link: https://management.azure.com/1a40e87e-6645-48e0-b27a-0b115d849a20?api-version=2022-04-01
